alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Moore; Richmond (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 11 at 6:39AM EST by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Moore, eastern Montgomery and northeastern Richmond Counties through 730 AM EST... At 638 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pinehurst, or 10 miles west of Southern Pines, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pinehurst, Aberdeen, Biscoe, Pinebluff, Robbins, Foxfire, Star, Candor, Taylortown and Steeds. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Doppler radar has indicated weak rotation with this storm. If the storm intensifies and rotation strengthens, a warning may need to be issued. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EST for central North Carolina.
